description.narrative: 1. Implementation of WUMP + 3 R Schemes 2. Capacity enhancement at NWA level 3. Capacity enhancement at local level 4. Monitoring and documentation

Local communities make use of improved access to drinking water or irrigation by adopting effective water resources management and 3R measures in Dailekh. Different stakeholders in the water sector are aware and accept the validity of the WUMP+3R approach. NWA partners are capacitated to apply WUMP +3R approach. RAIN partners BSP Nepal and NEWAH in particular are intensively monitored and coached by HELVETAS in the application of WUMP+3R. Learning is documented through process-monitoring

The activities planned for the year 2014/15 will focus on following areas: i) support the WUMP+ 3R pilot VDCs for the implementation of water schemes with especial focus on 3R measures ii) Conduct training for NWA partners to apply WUMP+ 3R iii) Organize sharing event among different stakeholders in the water sector iv) Provide technical backstopping (coaching and monitoring) to Rain partners to apply WUMP +3R v) Conduct training for V-WASH-CC members to implement WUMP+3R schemes vi) Conduct follow up activities and document WUMP +3R learning through monitoring

The results of the piloting WUMP + 3R are promising for the better management of water resources and make communities more resilience to climate change adaptation. As WUMP + 3R (master plan) includes short term and long term plan for the implementation of water schemes (drinking water and sanitation, irrigation, energy etc.) and associated 3R measures, HELVETAS and RAIN realized necessity of follow up activities.
- Follow up monitoring of the WUMP +3R approach by HELVETAS Nepal, BSP Nepal and NEWAH - Technical back stopping to RAIN partners to apply WUMP+3R approach. - Additional implementation of 3R water schemes in WUMP + 3R piloted VDC by HELVETAS in Dailekh with special focus on 3R measures - Reaching out to the Nepali water sector in order to validate with and inform stakeholders on WUMP+3R
This information will soon be available

follow up of WUMP3R pilot phase: - additional implementation by HELVETAS - coaching by HELVETAS of RAIN partners BSP and NEWAH - local level stakeholder capacity development in 4 VDCs - process monitoring and documentation - capacity development on WUMP3R at NWA level - sharing and validation among larger water sector
